[CAR](http://www.car-cre.org.au/), the body who funds my postdoc, are advertising two full time PhD scholarships for students who are interested in researching air quality. There are CAR investigators who will serve as supervisors in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Wollongong and Hobart. Further information can be found in the three documents below.

*   [CAR 2013 Scholarships_Information](http://samcliffordinfo.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/car-2013-scholarships_information.pdf)
*   [PhD Scholarships CAR 2013 Call for Applications](http://samcliffordinfo.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/phd-scholarships-car-2013-call-for-applications.pdf)
*   [PhD application form CAR 2013.docx](http://samcliffordinfo.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/phd-application-form-car-2013x.doc)
